Description of incident: A research associate's laptop was stolen during the course of research with a Tufts professor.  The research was being conducted at MGH.  The laptop was mostly used for research, but a sensitive file had been uploaded in early 2010.  It contained a spreadsheet with the information of applicants who applied to the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences at Tufts.  Applicant Social Security numbers were included in the spreadsheet.  The theft occurred in April of 2011 and was reported to MGH.  Tufts learned of the breach on June 16, 2011.
